did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Head of the Connecticut Regatta Collection, 1981 - 1986
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: Includes programs from the Head of the Connecticut Regatta, 1981-1986, and approximately forty 3 x 5 inch photographs and two 8 x 10 inch photographs.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Head of the Connecticut Regatta Collection, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Given by Ed Rubacha of Middletown, Conn., in June 2006.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Includes programs from the Connecticut Regatta, 1981-1986, and approximately forty 3 x 5 inch photographs and two 8 x 10 inch photographs.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Rowing--United States.
